comment: Worst math teacher I have had in college. Rude and not helpful to students seeking help. Enjoys upsetting students and having the power of grading them. Don't take this class if you under any circumstance.

Don't take this corse unless you are good at math. A lot I students in the class struggled. She is very knowledgable but the only notes are what she gives in class. There is not a book. Fair grading scale. Very rude in class and through emails. Not inspiring to me as ECE major. Required reflections with negative feedback on activities  points off.

Dr. Banker was a fantastic professor.  I told her I had never done well in my high school math classes and she worked with me all semester (and I ended up with an A).  She's very nice and she was very patient with my round-about-way of doing math.  Highly recommend!

Dr. Banker was an awesome professor! She never assigned any more work than was necessary to learn the material, and her tests were not written to trip you up. Quite the opposite, I think she strives to help students learn and pass the class. I very easily got an A in her 4-week summer course.

Do NOT take Dr. Banker! HORRIBLE! She is everything KSU tells you NOT to be as a teacher. She grades based on her mood and how well she likes you; gives no explanation for grades she gives; NOT helpful with homework or studying; & she wants to beat you out of the grade you earned & enjoys seeing students struggle more than succeed. SHE IS TERRIBLE!

I enjoyed Dr. Banker's class & I felt like the time always went by fast in her class. I like how we worked in groups and used manipulatives instead of listening to boring lecture. Tests were OK, group projects are a waste of time, 2 easy papers, HW, quiz grades.

test=easy.Banker is disorganized and used unsaid standards tied it to an often 5 point matrix.An A paper could be reduced to a borderline B/C or worse for trivial reasons.  Homework assignments may be assigned in odd places online-there's a zero.While she is smart,there is no room for smarter folks,If you are smart, have honor & pride, avoid her.

Dr. Banker is very nice and approachable when you need help. That said, her directions for assignments are extremely difficult to follow sometimes. With assignments due weekly in Geometry, it gets very frustrating. Her grades are based on a lot of different factors, not just tests, so you have plenty of opportunities to make an A.

Dr. Banker is not an "easy a," but she will help you actually learn the material. Most students are actually afraid of those teachers. So, if you don't want to work or learn, choose another professor. She is a very clear teacher.

Dr Banker was an AWESOME professor! I took the summer class and even tho there was a lot of material to cover she was very clear in all expectations and gave ample time to complete work. As long as you come to class and PAY ATTENTION you wont have any problems. Shes always available and willing to offer help as long as she sees that you are trying.

People that complain about her being hard do not attend class regularly.  She goes over everything you need to know and if you study what she talks about and everything on her study guide you will get an A.

She is a nice lady, but gradesvery hard.  All assignments require written responces and they must be VERY detailed.  If you don't write exactly what she would have, then you will not get points.  Ask her a question if you don't understand something once, anymore and she'll get mad.  Her Final is tricky with some material not even covered on it!

Her math tests are word problems which are subjective. If she likes the answer, she will give you full points. If it is not exactly what she would have written, she takes off points. She uses the textbook but makes changes as she deems appropriate which makes studying difficult.

Run away as fast as you can!  Do not take this professor!  She is a mean spirited teacher. You are afraid to ask questions of her.  Again, run as fast as you can away from her.  She believes all other teachers are wrong in how they teach math and she is right.  Run as fast as you can! It is hard to watch her destroy students confidence! Run!

I had her for my last two math classes and was very disapointed not to get her for 3317. She is a wonderful professor and I feel that she is one of KSU's best. Her tests are difficult but she is fair in grading and as long as you attempt to answer a question she will give partial credit.
Sweet lady! Not too hard.

She has favorites and if you are not her favorite she can be very cruel.  She picks on certain students to the point of tears.  Her tests are really hard and usually nothing like what you have been learning.  Do not question anything in her class because she will make you feel stupid and she will never see your side.
Loved her!! Her tests were difficult but she gives many opportunities for extra credit. Pay attention and take good notes and you will do fine. She is always available if you need to ask questions.

I cannot believe they are still letting this woman teach. She holds personal feelings against students and takes pleasure in making them feel stupid. Info covered in class is barely on test, and what was not covered on test is weighted heavily on tests. Unfair grading procedures and clarity is hard to come by. DO NOT TAKE HER!

Her tests are not reflective of what she is teaching. They are riddled with trick questions and she is not very clear in what she wants answered. Compared to other ECE math teachers she expects you to be a math major to comprehend what she wants you to learn. AVOID IF YOU CAN
EVIL EVIL WOMAN.  KEEP AWAY FROM HER!

She thinks she is the greatest teacher in the world...but she isn't. She makes mistakes and gets mad if they are pointed out. Her tests are hard b/c she askes for EVERY little detail. There is quie a bit of extra credit, but that is about the only good thing. If you explain everything and more on test and quizes you might do ok...other than that-UG
If you ask for clarification, she treats you like an idiot.....UGH!!! DO NOT TAKE HER!!!!!!!
Funny, excited about math but wastes time waiting for the answer that she wants to hear.
Very Easy Tests!  She also gives you article reviews to help your grade!  Easy A!
This lady was the worst teacher ever! She was very very unclear on the material she was teaching. Don't take her unless you want to be taked to like a child!
What a frusterating teacher. Talks to everyone like they are children. Courses material was pretty easy but her wording was confusing on all the tests.
Absolutely Horrible!  Unclear teaching style. Very unhelpful and insulting when asked questions.  Almost always late to class.  Very snotty when approached outside of class. Avoid if possible.
